content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm looking to rent it out for the highest possible price. Let's start with an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with a strong sense of responsibility and ethics, I'm searching for the most affordable option. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
